DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect low glycemic load versus standard diet pregnancy outcomes related risk obesity , diabetes , heart disease mother infant .
DOC.brief_title: A Low Glycemic Load Diet During Pregnancy Overweight Women
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman prepregnant first trimester BMI equal great 25 kg/m2 less 45 kg/m2 Singleton pregnancy Willing consume diet duration pregnancy Participant week 28 less pregnancy baseline visit Smoking pregnancy Major medical illness ( e.g. , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , thyroid disease ) Patients take prescription medication know affect body weight Alcohol consumption pregnancy Patients declare intention deliver infant environment outside Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center , Boston High level physical activity
